name: virustotal-premium
label: VirusTotal Premium
description: VirusTotal Premium Services are used to get more threat context and exposes advanced threat hunting and malware discovery endpoints and functionality. This connector facilitates the automated operations related to analyze retro hunts, search intelligence, livehunt notifications, livehunt rulesets, and download files from VirusTotal.

fields.title: Server
fields.description: Server URL of the VirusTotal Premium server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: server_url

fields.title: API Key
fields.description: API key that is configured for your account to access the VirusTotal premium server.
fields.name: api_key

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Download File
operations.description: Download a file from VirusTotal based on the ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Hash Value
parameters.description: SHA-256, SHA-1 or MD5 of the file for which you want to retrieve a VirusTotal report.
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify SHA-256, SHA-1 or MD5 of the file.

operations.title: Create ZIP File
operations.description: Creates a password-protected ZIP with VirusTotal files based on the password and hashes you have specified.

parameters.title: Hashes
parameters.description: List of comma-separated hash values based on which you want to create a zip file in VirusTotal.
parameters.name: hashes

parameters.title: Password
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify a password for protecting the ZIP file.
parameters.name: password

operations.title: Get ZIP File Status
operations.description: Retrieves a information about a ZIP file from VirusTotal based on the ID you have specified.

parameters.title: ZIP File ID
parameters.description: ID of the ZIP file identifier for which you want to retrieve a zip file information from VirusTotal.
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: ID of the ZIP file identifier.

operations.title: Get ZIP File URL
operations.description: Retrieves a signed URL from where you can download the specified ZIP file from VirusTotal based on the ID you have specified. Note: The URL expires after 1 hour.

parameters.title: ZIP File ID
parameters.description: ID of the ZIP file identifier for which you want to retrieve a signed URL from VirusTotal.
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: ID of the ZIP file identifier.

operations.title: Download ZIP File
operations.description: Download a file from VirusTotal based on the ID you have specified.

parameters.title: ZIP File ID
parameters.description: ID of the ZIP file identifier for which you want to retrieve a signed URL from VirusTotal.
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: ID of the ZIP file identifier.

operations.title: Get PCAP File Behaviour
operations.description: Retrieves a PCAP file generated during a fileâ€™s behavior analysis in VirusTotal based on the report ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Report ID
parameters.description: Report ID of the sandbox for which you want to retrieve a PCAP file from VirusTotal.
parameters.name: sandbox_id
parameters.tooltip: Report ID of the sandbox

operations.title: Search Intelligence
operations.description: Search for a files in VirusTotal based on the query and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Query
parameters.description: Specify a query for which you want to search a files in VirusTotal.
parameters.name: query
parameters.tooltip: Specify a query for which you want to search a files in VirusTotal. For ex. content: "hello world"

parameters.title: Order By
parameters.name: order
parameters.description: (Optional) Order in which you want to sort the results retrieved from VirusTotal. Note: If your Query parameter contains content search the order parameter will make no effect.
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Order in which you want to sort the results retrieved from VirusTotal. Note: If your Query parameter contains content search the order parameter will make no effect.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the number of results this operation returns, per page, in the response. By Default, is set as 10.
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the number of results this operation returns, per page, in the response. By Default, is set as 10.

parameters.title: Descriptors Only
parameters.description: (Optional) Whether to return full object information or just object descriptors. By Default, is set as false.
parameters.name: descriptors_only
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Whether to return full object information or just object descriptors. By Default, is set as false.

parameters.title: Cursor
parameters.description: (Optional) Cursor is only used if a previous operation returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a cursor element, the value of the cursor element will include a cursor parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.
parameters.name: cursor
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Cursor is only used if a previous operation returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a cursor element, the value of the cursor element will include a cursor parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.

operations.title: Create Livehunt Ruleset
operations.description: Creates a hunting livehunt ruleset based on the ruleset name, rules, and other input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Ruleset Name
parameters.description: Name of the ruleset based on which you want to create hunting livehunt ruleset in VirusTotal.
parameters.name: name

parameters.title: Rules
parameters.description: Specify a rules based on which you want to create hunting livehunt ruleset in VirustTotal.
parameters.name: rules
parameters.placeholder: e.g. rule foobar { strings: $ = "foobar" condition: all of them }

parameters.title: Enabled
parameters.description: (Optional) Select this option (default is selected) to enabled livehunt ruleset from which you want to create a livehunt ruleset in VirusTotal.
parameters.name: enabled
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Select this option (default is selected) to enabled livehunt ruleset from which you want to create a livehunt ruleset in VirusTotal.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the number of results this operation returns, per page, in the response.By Default, is set as 100.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.title: Notification Emails
parameters.description: (Optional) List of comma-separated notifications emails based on which you want to create a livehunt ruleset in VirusTotal.
parameters.name: notification_emails

operations.title: Get Livehunt Rulesets List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all livehunt rulesets from VirusTotal based on the input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Filter
parameters.description: Specify a filter for which you want to filter the rulesets according to the values of certain attributes in VirusTotal.
parameters.name: filter
parameters.tooltip: Specify a filter for which you want to filter the rulesets according to the values of certain attributes in VirusTotal. For ex. filter=enabled:true

parameters.title: Order By
parameters.name: order
parameters.description: (Optional) Order in which you want to sort the results retrieved from VirusTotal. Note: If your Query parameter contains content search the order parameter will make no effect.
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Order in which you want to sort the results retrieved from VirusTotal. Note: If your Query parameter contains content search the order parameter will make no effect.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the number of results this operation returns, per page, in the response. By Default, is set as 10.
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the number of results this operation returns, per page, in the response. By Default, is set as 10.

parameters.title: Cursor
parameters.description: (Optional) Cursor is only used if a previous operation returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a cursor element, the value of the cursor element will include a cursor parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.
parameters.name: cursor
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Cursor is only used if a previous operation returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a cursor element, the value of the cursor element will include a cursor parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.

operations.title: Get Livehunt Ruleset Details
operations.description: Retrieve a specific livehunt ruleset from VirusTotal based on the ruleset ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Ruleset ID
parameters.description: ID of the ruleset for which you want to retrieve a livehunt ruleset details from VirusTotal.
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: ID of the Ruleset.

operations.title: Update Livehunt Ruleset
operations.description: Updates a hunting livehunt ruleset based on the ruleset id, ruleset name, and other input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Ruleset ID
parameters.description: ID of the ruleset based on which you want to update livehunt ruleset in VirusTotal.
parameters.name: name

parameters.title: Ruleset Name
parameters.description: Name of the ruleset based on which you want to update livehunt ruleset in VirusTotal.
parameters.name: name

parameters.title: Rules
parameters.description: Specify a rules based on which you want to update livehunt ruleset in VirustTotal.
parameters.name: rules
parameters.placeholder: e.g. rule foobar { strings: $ = "foobar" condition: all of them }

parameters.title: Enabled
parameters.description: (Optional) Select this option (default is selected) to enabled livehunt ruleset from which you want to update a livehunt ruleset in VirusTotal.
parameters.name: enabled
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Select this option (default is selected) to enabled livehunt ruleset from which you want to create a livehunt ruleset in VirusTotal.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the number of results this operation returns, per page, in the response.By Default, is set as 100.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.title: Notification Emails
parameters.description: (Optional) List of comma-separated notifications emails based on which you want to update a livehunt ruleset in VirusTotal.
parameters.name: notification_emails

operations.title: Delete Livehunt Ruleset
operations.description: Deletes a specific livehunt ruleset from VirusTotal based on the ruleset ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Ruleset ID
parameters.description: ID of the ruleset for which you want to remove a livehunt ruleset details from VirusTotal.
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: ID of the Ruleset.

operations.title: Get Livehunt Notifications List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all livehunt notifications from VirusTotal based on the input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Filter
parameters.description: (Optional)Specify a filter for which you want to filter the livehunt notifications according to the values of certain attributes in VirusTotal.
parameters.name: filter
parameters.tooltip: (Optional)Specify a filter for which you want to filter the livehunt notifications according to the values of certain attributes in VirusTotal. For ex. filter=enabled:true

parameters.title: Order By
parameters.name: order
parameters.description: (Optional) Order in which you want to sort the results retrieved from VirusTotal.
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Order in which you want to sort the results retrieved from VirusTotal.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the number of results this operation returns, per page, in the response. By Default, is set as 10.
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the number of results this operation returns, per page, in the response. By Default, is set as 10.

parameters.title: Cursor
parameters.description: (Optional) Cursor is only used if a previous operation returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a cursor element, the value of the cursor element will include a cursor parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.
parameters.name: cursor
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Cursor is only used if a previous operation returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a cursor element, the value of the cursor element will include a cursor parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.

parameters.title: Count Limit
parameters.name: count_limit
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of notifications counted this operation returns in the response. By Default, is set as 200 and maximum value is 10,000.
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of notifications counted this operation returns in the response. By Default, is set as 200 and maximum value is 10,000.

operations.title: Get Livehunt Notifications Files List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all file objects for livehunt notifications from VirusTotal based on the input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Filter
parameters.description: (Optional)Specify a filter for which you want to filter the files objects for livehunt notifications according to the values of certain attributes in VirusTotal.
parameters.name: filter
parameters.tooltip: (Optional)Specify a filter for which you want to filter the files objects for livehunt notifications according to the values of certain attributes in VirusTotal. For ex. filter=enabled:true

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the number of results this operation returns, per page, in the response. By Default, is set as 10.
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the number of results this operation returns, per page, in the response. By Default, is set as 10.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Cursor is only used if a previous operation returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a cursor element, the value of the cursor element will include a cursor parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.

parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of notifications counted this operation returns in the response. By Default, is set as 200 and maximum value is 10,000.
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of notifications counted this operation returns in the response. By Default, is set as 200 and maximum value is 10,000.

operations.title: Get Livehunt Notifications Details
operations.description: Retrieve a specific livehunt notifications from VirusTotal based on the notification ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Notification ID
parameters.description: ID of the notification for which you want to retrieve a livehunt notification details from VirusTotal.
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: ID of the notification.

operations.title: Get Livehunt Rule Files List
operations.description: Retrieve a hunting livehunt ruleset by hunting notification files relationship from VirusTotal based on the ruleset ID and other input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Ruleset ID
parameters.description: ID of the ruleset for which you want to retrieve a hunting livehunt ruleset by hunting notification files relationship from VirusTotal.
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: ID of the ruleset.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the number of results this operation returns, per page, in the response.
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the number of results this operation returns, per page, in the response.

parameters.title: Cursor
parameters.description: (Optional) Cursor is only used if a previous operation returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a cursor element, the value of the cursor element will include a cursor parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.

parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Cursor is only used if a previous operation returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a cursor element, the value of the cursor element will include a cursor parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.

operations.title: Create Retrohunt Job
operations.description: Creates a retrohunt job based on the  rules, and other input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Rules
parameters.description: Specify a rules based on which you want to create hunting livehunt ruleset in VirustTotal.
parameters.name: rules
parameters.placeholder: e.g. rule demo { strings: $ = "demo" condition: all of them }

parameters.title: Notification Emails
parameters.description: (Optional) List of comma-separated notifications emails based on which you want to update a livehunt ruleset in VirusTotal.
parameters.name: notification_emails

parameters.title: Corpus
parameters.description: (Optional) Corpus allows you to select which dataset you want to scan with your job. You can choose either Main, or GoodWare.
parameters.name: corpus

parameters.title: Start Time
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the starting DateTime from when you want to create retrohunt job in VirusTotal.
parameters.name: start_time
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the starting DateTime from when you want to create a retrohunt job in VirusTotal.

parameters.title: End time
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the ending DateTime till when you want to create a retrohunt job in VirusTotal.
parameters.name: end_time
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the ending DateTime till when you want to create a retrohunt job in VirusTotal.

operations.title: Abort Retrohunt Job
operations.description: Abort a specific retrohunt job from VirusTotal based on the job ID you have specified.

parameters.title: job ID
parameters.description: ID of the job for which you want to abort a retrohunt job in VirusTotal.
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: ID of the job.

operations.title: Get Retrohunt jobs List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all retrohunt jobs from VirusTotal based on the input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Filter
parameters.description: (Optional)Specify a filter for which you want to filter the retrohunt jobs according to the values of certain attributes in VirusTotal.
parameters.name: filter
parameters.tooltip: (Optional)Specify a filter for which you want to filter the retrohunt jobs according to the values of certain attributes in VirusTotal. For ex. filter=enabled:true

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the number of results this operation returns, per page, in the response. By Default, is set as 10.
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the number of results this operation returns, per page, in the response. By Default, is set as 10.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Cursor is only used if a previous operation returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a cursor element, the value of the cursor element will include a cursor parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.

operations.description: Retrieve a specific retrohunt job from VirusTotal based on the job ID you have specified.

parameters.title: job ID
parameters.description: ID of the job for which you want to retrieve a retrohunt job details from VirusTotal.
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: ID of the job.

operations.title: Get Retrohunt Job Matching Files
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all retrohunt job matching files from VirusTotal based on the input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the number of results this operation returns, per page, in the response. By Default, is set as 10.
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the number of results this operation returns, per page, in the response. By Default, is set as 10.

operations.title: Delete Retrohunt Job
operations.description: Delete a specific retrohunt job from VirusTotal based on the job ID you have specified.

parameters.title: job ID
parameters.description: ID of the job for which you want to delete a retrohunt job in VirusTotal.
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: ID of the job.
